item.title: Raspberry Pi IOT Air Conditioner
item.description: Why The heating and cooling system in my house works well everywhere except my bedroom. In the summer the temperature can reach over 100°F and in the winter it can drop below 50°F. In an effort to make it more bearable, we picked up an LG LP1415SHR air conditioner, and man did it work. There was, of course, one major problem: I couldn’t control it from the comfort of my bed!
